name: Weaponized Wall - Fighter(7) / Weapon Master(7) / Dwarven Defender(26)
author: magaiti

posts.author: magaiti
posts.content:
Playable: levels 1-40 PvE, level 40 PvP

This is a tweak of "The True Masterful Wall" by ArcticDwarf900
http://home.comcast.net/~worldofgreyhaw ... 29615.html

This build has following changes:
 - +1 AB because of epic feats redistribution (more Great Str at the expense of hit points)
 - +1 fort/will due to better pre-epic class combination (WM7 delayed to clvl 21)


Fighter(7), Weapon Master(7), Dwarven Defender(26), Dwarf, Any Lawful

Discipline 43(51), Intimidate 4, Spellcraft 19(20), Tumble 20


As for weapon, any martial of your choice. "The True Masterful Wall" used warhammer.
